src:
Lebdi še višje kot v devetih nebesih
Lewis Hamilton slavi že šesti naslov svetovnega prvaka v formuli 1. Od rekorda Michaela Schumacherja ga loči le še ena lovorika.
05 Nov 2019, 07:15 by Miha Šimnovec
￼LJUBLJANA – Zaradi velike premoči tako moštva kot tudi dirkača je bilo tudi letos pravzaprav le vprašanje časa, kdaj si bo Mercedesov zvezdnik Lewis Hamilton zagotovil že tretji zaporedni in skupno šesti naslov svetovnega prvaka v formuli 1. Da se je z novo lovoriko okronal prav v Austinu, je bilo – glede na to, kako je potekalo prvenstvo – po svoje kar pričakovano. Ker se povrhu vsega onstran Atlantika že od nekdaj počuti kakor riba v vodi, bi si za postavitev pike na i težko izbral primernejše prizorišče.»Če sem iskren, še nisem dojel, kaj mi je uspelo. To še ni prišlo do mene,« je novi stari šampion priznal, potem ko se je po dirki za veliko nagrado ZDA, na kateri je moral priznati premoč le svojemu finskemu moštvenemu sotekmovalcu Valtteriju Bottasu, na hitro oprhal, preoblekel in vnovič stopil pred množico novinarjev. »Počutim se, kot da bi bil v devetih nebesih, ne, če dobro premislim, lebdim bistveno višje,« je pribil 34-letni Anglež in večkrat ponovil, kako zelo se je moral potruditi za osvojitev šestega naslova svetovnega prvaka. »Ne, to še zdaleč ni bil sprehod po parku. Ferrari in Red Bull sta nam namreč dihala za ovratnik, tudi Valtteri je letos naredil velik korak naprej. Lahko celo rečem, da je to moja doslej najtežja sezona v karieri. Če sem želel obdržati primat, sem moral dirkati najbolje, kot znam, oziroma najhitreje, kot zmorem,« je razlagal Hamilton in po kratkem premisleku nadaljeval, da je bilo to zanj najzahtevnejše prvenstvo doslej tudi zaradi izgube Nikija Laude.
Čuti, da je Niki nekje blizu
»Za naše moštvo je bil izjemno pomemben. Vem, da bi tokrat snel svojo čepico pred nami. Zelo ga pogrešam, vendar čutim, da je vselej z nami. Ravno pred tokratno dirko sem spet videl dva fanta s kapama, kakršno je nosil tudi Niki. Njegov duh bo vedno tu nekje blizu,« se je spomnil legendarnega Avstrijca, ki je preminil 20. maja letos. »Nisem si mislil, da se me bo njegova smrt tako zelo dotaknila. Res sem bil potrt, ko nas je zapustil. Zares sem ga imel rad; večkrat pomislim, kako me je pred leti v hotelu v Singapurju preprič(ev)al, naj prestopim k Mercedesu. Imel je izjemen občutek za humor in kritiko,« je povedal o Laudi.Seveda se ni mogel izogniti vprašanjem o lovu na rekordno sedmo lovoriko, kolikor jih ima zgolj Michael Schumacher. »Nadvse sem počaščen, da me primerjate z Michaelom, na koncu koncev sem odraščal v spremljanju njegovih dirk. Kar mu je uspelo, je neverjetno. Da bi ga ujel, nikoli ni bil moj cilj. Živel sem pač v prepričanju, da se mu niti približati ni mogoče,« je razkril angleški zvezdnik, pri čemer se ni pozabil zahvaliti vsem, ki so mu tako ali drugače pomagali priti tako daleč. »Izjemno sem hvaležen Mercedesu, ki me podpira od mojega 13. leta. Kakor drugi vrhunski športniki sem tudi jaz le en člen močne verige. Vem sicer, česar vse sem sposoben, a brez te ekipe, ki mi vsako leto znova izdela vrhunski dirkalnik, ne bi mogel unovčiti svoje silne nadarjenosti,« je še dejal Hamilton.
text:
It hovers even higher than in the nine heavens
Lewis Hamilton is celebrating his sixth Formula 1 World Championship title with only one other laurel.
05 Nov 2019, 07:15 by Miha Simnovec
JLJUBLJANA - Because of the overwhelming power of both the team and the racer, it was only a matter of time this year when Mercedes star Lewis Hamilton secured his third consecutive and sixth Formula 1 World Champion title. Austin, according to how the championship went, was just as expected. Since it has always felt like a fish in the water beyond the Atlantic, I would have been hard pressed to choose a more appropriate venue for the spot. "To be honest, I have not figured out what I have done. This has not happened to me yet, "the new old champion confessed after briefly shaking, disguising himself and re-appearing in front of a crowd of reporters after the US Grand Prix race, in which he had to concede superiority only to his Finnish teammate Valtteri Bottas . "I feel like I was in nine heavens, not if I think correctly, hovering much higher," the 34-year-old Englishman said, repeating repeatedly how much he had to do to win his sixth world title. “No, this was far from a walk in the park. Ferrari and Red Bull are breathing down our collar, and Valtteri has taken a big step forward this year. I can even say that this is my hardest season of my career so far. If I wanted to keep primacy, I had to race the best I can, or the fastest I can, "Hamilton explained, continuing with a brief thought that this was his most challenging championship ever because of the loss of Nikki Lauda.
He feels that Niki is somewhere close
“He was extremely important to our team. I know this time he would take off his cap in front of us. I miss him very much, but I feel he is with us all the time. Just before this race, I saw two guys again with hats like Niki wore. His spirit will always be around here somewhere, ”recalled the legendary Austrian who passed away on May 20 this year. “I didn't think his death would touch me so much. I was really depressed when he left us. I really loved it; many times I think about how many years ago at a Singapore hotel I was persuaded to switch to a Mercedes. He had a tremendous sense of humor and criticism, "he said of Lauda. Of course, he could not avoid the question of hunting the record seventh laurel as much as Michael Schumacher has. “I am most honored to be compared to Michael, after all, I grew up watching his races. What he has done is incredible. To catch him was never my goal. I lived in the belief that he could not even be approached, "the English star revealed, not forgetting to thank everyone who helped him in one way or another. “I am extremely grateful to Mercedes for supporting me since I was 13 years old. Like other top athletes, I am only one link in the strong chain. I know what I can do, but without this team, which re-produces me a top-class racer every year, I would not be able to redeem my enormous talent, ”said Hamilton.
